description: Unique surrogate key for the reason record; used as the primary key without business meaning.
Business reason code used in operations (e.g., maintenance, road calls, tire actions); may be alphanumeric and user-visible.
Human-readable name or description of the operational reason.
Optional free-text notes providing additional context about the reason.
System-generated timestamp of the most recent update to this record.
Likely the application timestamp of the last user-driven change; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user or account that created the record.
Timestamp when the record was initially created.
Identifier of the user or account that last updated the record.
Timestamp when the record was last updated by a user.
